page.title: 05THE CONQUERING HERO INN
page.content: The present building of the{Conquering {Hero Inn}was built between 1850 to 1900 before the inn was built, some people say that there was a (ty dros nos) a house built over night. Providing a man could build his house and have smoke coming out of the chimney before sunrise, he could have that house as his own. A man called Mr Roberts built the inn, in those days if you fenced of a plot of land for 12 years it was yours. However the authority would not let him have the land and took the fence down but Mr Roberts put the fence back up and the authority took it back down.So this went on and he finally took it to a court of law. Mr Roberts won the case and built the inn. That is one of the stories of how it is called the Conquering Hero Inn.
